heroSection.title: We'll take you where you want
heroSection.description: Travel in comfort and reliability with our taxi service. We offer fast and reliable delivery anywhere in the city. Our goal is to provide you with a safe and enjoyable trip.

service.sectionDescription: All of our services to make you as comfortable and convenient as possible

items.title: Driver assistance
items.titleText: The driver will help with shopping, lifting heavy items, or other daily tasks

items.title: Special requests
items.titleText: Ability to communicate special needs in advance so that the vehicle can be prepared accordingly

items.title: Pet transportation
items.titleText: Ability to transport pets using special seating and safe conditions

items.title: Female driver
items.titleText: Female customers can afford to book a cab with a female driver.

items.title: Excursions & Tours
items.titleText: Offering themed tours or excursions so customers can learn more about local attractions

items.title: Electronic payments
items.titleText: Ability to pay for the trip using e-wallets or bank cards

achievements.title: Bold Steps Forward
achievements.description: We started as a small idea, but our determination and dedication led us to big wins. We dared to cross boundaries and offer a game-changing transportation solution.

achievements.title: Created unique rates for your comfort.
achievements.description: We realize that every customer is unique. That's why we offer a variety of plans so you can choose an option that fits your needs and budget.

achievements.title: We are proud of our path and look forward to the future
achievements.description: Every day brings us new challenges and opportunities. We're ready to move forward, do more for you and continue to make a difference in the cab industry.

tariff.headerDescribe: Our fares are designed to fit your needs and maximize your comfort during your trip. We offer a variety of options including economy options, comfortable cars, freight transportation, and VIP services. Whatever your purpose and preferences, we have the right fare to make your trip enjoyable and convenient.

plans.title: Universal
plans.describe: An option for all occasions and needs

plans.title: Mini-van
plans.describe: Spacious solution for large groups or families

plans.title: VIP
plans.describe: Luxury, high standard and personalized service

blocks.title: We are 'iki taxi' company
blocks.description: Specializing in providing high quality cab services. Our goal is to make your transportation comfortable and reliable.

blocks.title: 1. Professional drivers:
blocks.description: Our drivers are experienced and conscientious professionals who ensure your safety and comfort during every trip.

blocks.title: 2. Variety of routes:
blocks.description: We provide a wide variety of routes to meet every customer's needs. Whether you need to get to work, the airport or an important event, we will find the best route for you.

blocks.title: 3. Convenience and speed:
blocks.description: We value your time, so our ordering system is fast and intuitive. Just select your destination, confirm your order and our cab will be waiting for you on time.

items.title: Unique bonuses and opportunities for career advancement.
Attractive promotions and discounts for you and your customers.
Quick and convenient access to orders through our platform.
A professional team ready to support you in any situation.
Opportunity to increase revenue through high order flow.

application.submitApplication: Send an application for a cab driver job.

footer.contactInfoList: Is a modern and reliable company providing high quality passenger transportation services.
